translations: n.投掷者；抛油环；制陶坯的工人

phrs.translation: 传球员, 投掷式充填机, 抛油环, 投掷者
抛油环, 抛油器, 挡油环, 挡油圈
火焰发射器, 火焰中耕机, 喷火器, 粗火
摔砂造模机, 抛砂机

sentences.sentence: The other side features the famous ancient Greek marble statue of a discus-thrower, Discobolus, portraits of athletes and the Arabic numeral "2008".
sentences.translation: 另一侧是著名的古希腊大理石掷铁饼者雕像、运动员肖像和阿拉伯数字“2008”。

sentences.sentence: Iraqi shoe-thrower released in Baghdad Link to this audio.
sentences.translation: 伊拉克掷鞋记者在巴格达获释。
